website_summaries.verdict: Pretty twin bunks in crisp white with headboard, footboard, and ladder. Also available in espresso.
pros: The beds can be stacked or used separately
A good amount of space exists under the bottom bunk for storage
cons: The twin mattresses may not suit older, larger children

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bunk bed
customer_reviews.text: The 1st thing I noticed was the hardware wasn’t cheap, it contained very strong looking bags bolts & screws the went in tandem through the frame for a rock solid feel. We have 2 adult women on this bunk bed and they couldn’t be happier. I would totally recommend this bed to anyone with a close quarters living situation or someone just looking for a really nice set of side by side beds. 👍👌😁
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy >>>>
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are good ... for me, I wouldn't assemble it without a power drill ... a must ... as I didn't want to spend 4+ hours getting it together ... the twin grand kiddies were coming in March ... but ... the virus nixed that trip ... I "face-timed" them and they immediately started a "spirited discussion" about who would get to sleep on the top bunk, so we'll have to wait for the "next chapter" to see how it performs on its "maiden voyage"
customer_reviews.author: zuggie

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very solid bed for the price point. It will come in TWO packages so don't worry if you don't have all the items in the first package. Took about 1.5 hours to put together alone and it came with some really good instructions. I recommend to have your pieces laid out in alphabetical order first.
customer_reviews.author: Rob K

customer_reviews.title: This bunk bed is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! Perfect size for my 4 & 2 year old. Was looking for a bed that was wasn’t to high since it would be my 2 year old 1st time out the crib and this bed for the bill! Also, the room isn't huge and so I didn't want a tall bunk bed that was going to swallow up the entire room. It's perfect. They both love it. Took my husband about 2 hours to put together.Very sturdy, nice quality solid wood & color.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Swenson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love these bunk beds and my girls love them too. Easy to assemble and the quality is great too! Love that someday when they want it to be separated it’s an easy disassemble. Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bunk bed set!
customer_reviews.text: Great bed! Kids love it! Very sturdy. Very clean, classic look. It seems obvious, but If you follow the directions it will probably be quicker to assemble than it was for...us ;) Pre drilled holes were well aligned. Extra pieces were provided, or that was because we didn’t always follow directions. I bought two 6 inch twin memory foam mattresses that fit perfectly. I personally would not feel comfortable for my younger kids to have an 8 inch mattress for the top bunk at least. I don’t feel the guardrail would be as effective. In any case, my kids love this bunk bed set and so do I! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: J. HARMANSKI

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice bunk beds. I was honestly surprised at how heavy & sturdy they are! As a mom without any help these took about 3 hours to assemble. The instructions are just diagrams, no words so be careful that you have the right piece when assembling. I had my 6yr old help me lift the top bed in place WOW it was a struggle but we did it!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my kids room!

So it took a lot longer to assemble that it would of if they'd been labled properly! Other than that very happy with this purchase. A much sturdier bunk bed than others on market for same price!!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bunk for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this bunk. All holes lined up. Sturdy. True white. Sturdy hardware. The packaging of the parts was excellent which in my experience is a sign of a quality product. One tip, buy some better screws for the slats and use a screw gun. Broke a screw which I will blame myself as it clearly states not to use power tools. That was the only part I used a power tool. For the price you will not find anything better. For the reviewer who said they didn’t receive white plugs, there are none and the picture clearly shows that. Does it diminish the appearance? Absolutely not.
